subject: Presidential Who's who Cordially invite's you.
body:
Presidential Who's Who















2927 
              41ST Avenue, Queens Plaza North
              Long Island City, NY 11101-3304
  




Dear 
        Sir / Madam,
It’s my distinct 
        pleasure to inform you that you are being considered for inclusion in 
        Presidential Who’s Who among Business and professional Achievers.
The 2008 edition 
        of the registry will include biographies of our countries most 
        accomplished business professionals, listed in their areas of expertise. 
        This recognition is an honor shared by thousands of executive and professionals 
        annually. Inclusion is considered by many as the single highest mark of 
        achievement.
Due to publishing 
        deadlines, please complete the enclosed invitation and return it to us 
        promptly. Upon receipt of application, one of our professional interviewers 
        will
        contact you to verify your application and assist you with your inclusion. 
        You can email us at info@presidentialwhoswho.com
Most importantly 
        there are no fees to be included in this publication.
On behalf of the 
        CEO and myself, we wish you continued success.
Sincerely,
Joseph S. Dunn
        Managing Director

        To fill out the Invitation; please visit - PRESIDENTIAL 
        WHO'S WHO
 






 









  This message was sent to you as an opt-in subscriber to The Speed Network or 
  one of its affiliates. 
  We will continue to bring you valuable offers on the products and services 
  that interest you most. If you wish to unsubscribe, please 




  Click Here





    Postal opt-out - 1300 NW 17th avenue Ste 218 Delray Beach FL 33445
